Hello,

I am using H-3.0 and I noticed that even after a clean termination=
 of my broad crawl (that consumed the entire 2G allocated for heap), the 2G=
 memory remains occupied.
If I start a new light-test-job (with no other jo=
bs running), it shows mem-use =3D1.7G and heap-size =3D2G right from the ve=
ry beginning.
=A0I have had no other jobs running before I top'ed to see th=
e memory and CPU usage.

After I killed my heritrix and restarted it, of co=
urse things got back to normal.
Anyone else encountered this memory issue?
=

Thanks,
Pranay
